About us

What We Do

At Lee's Inn, you'll find the best and freshest burgers in town. We cook our meat fresh every day and produce our own patties in the stores. We do not use any pre-made or frozen products. Our buns are being baked fresh every day and by ourselves. We only use ingredients from regional suppliers that we know personally ....

You can make any burger with individual ingredients to your personal favorite burgers with us.

Our fries are also freshly produced by us in the shop and we do not use pre-produced products. Fresh potatoes from local suppliers and freshly produced for you every day. We offer a selection of Fries, Sweet Potato Fries, Yuca Fries, Cheese Fries and Chili Cheese Fries.

Our shakes are famous and notorious. You complete your menu for a perfect #cheatday menu. Also check out our Shake of the Month. Every month we have a new creation for you!
